column4: So someone correct me if im wrong but apprently Usb boot drives. are limited by their size i swore usb sticks came in 16gb. but im not sure. on that one.
yes they come in 16GB and bigger i have a 64GB
32 GB costs around 40 on sale to 60 or more depends on brand and store
I live in US and mine was 60 but ive seen them cheaper before
